content.body: I don’t see how supporting Set.p.add(thing1, thing2, ...otherThings); would break that, but I guess I’m missing something

TabAtkins: no Babel, es6-shim, and supporting browsers that don’t have arrows is still necessary for most demographics.

it would add extra things to the set than expected, yes
if add behaved like A.p.push
also the array parameter
